root.name: Immortal Defense
root.description: OverviewPath defense is a colorful experience.In Immortal Defense, players assume the role of a "path defender", an individual who leaves their body behind to enter the immaterial world of pathspace. Through sheer force of will, path defenders may intercept and destroy space ships traveling through pathspace -- the only means of faster-than-light travel.

similar_games.game: South Park Let's Go Tower Defense Play!
